about_the_game:
Holo Arena: Death League takes the ancient gladiator fights to be the main sport of the future, in an intense MOBA TPS battle.

  • Become a champion of the Holo Arena, triumph over your enemies and bring glory to your country. Conquer the lanes, break through the towers and destroy the core. Mirage stadium awaits you.
  • Learn to move through the treacherous jungle that surrounds you and you’ll dominate the battlefield. Be careful though, you still don’t know what might be living there.
  • Be the champion you want to be. Choose between six different classes, wear exoskeletons, equip high tech weapons and devastating war prototypes.
  • Create a team and fight with your friends to reach the death league, join a battle club and sign contracts with the sponsors, which provide coins by completing tasks in battle.

content_descriptors.notes: Holo Arena: Death League contains Intense Violence, Blood and Gore.

detailed_description:
GAME COMMUNITY


About the Game




Holo Arena: Death League takes the ancient gladiator fights to be the main sport of the future, in an intense MOBA TPS battle.

  • Become a champion of the Holo Arena, triumph over your enemies and bring glory to your country. Conquer the lanes, break through the towers and destroy the core. Mirage stadium awaits you.
  • Learn to move through the treacherous jungle that surrounds you and you’ll dominate the battlefield. Be careful though, you still don’t know what might be living there.
  • Be the champion you want to be. Choose between six different classes, wear exoskeletons, equip high tech weapons and devastating war prototypes.
  • Create a team and fight with your friends to reach the death league, join a battle club and sign contracts with the sponsors, which provide coins by completing tasks in battle.

name: Holo Arena: Death League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700K CPU 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements based on the game before optimization.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-9900K CPU 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements based on the game before optimization.

short_description: Holo Arena: Death League takes the ancient gladiator fights to be the main sport of the future, in an intense MOBA TPS battle.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
